WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 2100Z TO 0300Z COMMENCING
   DAILY 30 AUG THRU 28 SEP
   BY M/V BARU ATRIA, M/V LOCAR LH XXI,
   M/V LOCAR LH XXII, M/V LOCAR LH XXIV,
   M/V LH PLACIDO, M/V CBO ATLANTICO,
   M/V SANTOS SCOUT, M/V CBO GUANABARA,
   M/V CBO MANOELLA, M/V CBO BOSSA NOVA,
   M/V MAR LIMPO II, M/V ASTRO TUPI,
   M/V DANKO TIDE, M/V ASGAARD SOPHIA
   AND M/V SAPURA ESMERALDA
   IN AREA WITHIN TWO MILES OF 22-51.47S 040-21.50W.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2621/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 290400Z SEP 19.
